S06sspp2_2u:1121: yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1128: yo jihvāyā anutpādo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_2u:1137: yo dharmāṇām anutpādo na te dharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1153: yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1154: yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1155: yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1156: yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1157: yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1158: yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā.
S06sspp2_2u:1160: yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor anutpādo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1162: yas tejodhātor anutpādo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1163: yo vāyudhātor anutpādo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1164: ya ākāśadhātor anutpādo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1165: yo vijñānadhātor anutpādo na so vijñānadhātuḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1168: yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1170: yo nāmarūpasyānutpādo na tan nāmarūpaṃ, (ŚsP II-2 29)
S06sspp2_2u:1173: yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1174: yas tṛṣṇāyā anutpādo na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_2u:1177: yo jāter anutpādo na sā jātiḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1180: yo dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1181: yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā śīlapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1182: yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā anutpādo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1183: yo vīryapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā vīryapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1184: yo dhyānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dhyānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1185: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_2u:1188: yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1190: yaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1191: yo mahāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā mahāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1192: yaḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1193: yaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1196: yo navarāgraśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā navarāgraśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1198: yaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1199: yaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1200: yaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1203: yaḥ svabhavaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1206: yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1207: yaḥ samyakprahāṇānām anutpādo na tāni samyakprahāṇāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1208: ya ṛddhipādānām anutpādo na ta ṛddhipādāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1210: yo balānām anutpādo na tāni balāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1211: yo bodhyaṅgānām anutpādo na tāni bodhyaṅgāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1212: ya āryāṣṭāṅgasyānutpādo na sa āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1213: ya āryasatyānām anutpādo na tāny āryasatyāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1214: yo dhyānānām anutpādo na tāni dhyānāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1216: ya ārūpyasamāpattīnān anutpādo na tā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ, (ŚsP II-2 30)
S06sspp2_2u:1217: yo vimokṣāṇām anutpādo na te vimokṣāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1219: yaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām anutpādo na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1220: ya abhijñānām anutpādo na tā abhijñāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1221: yaḥ samādhīnām anutpādo na te samādhayaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1222: yo dhāraṇīmukhānām anutpādo na tāni dhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1223: yas tathāgatabalānām anutpādo na tāni tathāgatabalāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1224: yo vaiśāradyānām antpādo na tāni vaiśāradyāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1225: yaḥ pratisaṃvidām anutpādo na tā pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1226: yo mahāmaitryā anutpādo na sā mahāmaitrī,
S06sspp2_2u:1227: yo mahākaruṇāyā anutpādo na sā karuṇā,
S06sspp2_2u:1228: ya āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām anutpādo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1230: yaḥ sarvajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvajñatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1231: yo mārgākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā mārgākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1232: yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
S06sspp2_2u:1234: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ rūpeṇa yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tad rūpaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1235: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1236: vedanāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā vedanayā yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā na sā vedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1237: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1238: saṃjñāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā saṃjñayā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā na sā saṃjñā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1239: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ saṃjñāyā anutpādo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_2u:1240: saṃskārā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyāḥ saṃskārair ya āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā na te saṃskārā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1241: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1242: vijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ vijñāneṇa yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1243: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānam.
S06sspp2_2u:1244: cakṣur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ cakṣuṣā yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tac cakṣur notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1245: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yac cakṣuṣo 'nutpādo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1246: śrotram āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ śrotreṇa yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tac chrotraṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1247: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śrotrasyānutpādo na tac chrotraṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1249: śūnyaṃ ghrāṇena yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tad ghrāṇaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1250: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo ghrāṇasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1251: jihvāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā jihvayā yāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā na sā jihvā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1252: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jihvāyā anutpādo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_2u:1253: kāya āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ kāyeṇa ya āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyo na sa kāyo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1254: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ kāyasyānutpādo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1255: mana āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ manasā yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tan mano notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1256: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo manaso 'nutpādo na tan manaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1257: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ rūpeṇa yad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ na tad rūpaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1258: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1260: yaś ca śūnyo na sa śabdo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1261: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śabdasyānutpādo na sa śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1262: gandha āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyo gandhena yaś ca śūnyo na sa gandho notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1263: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo gandhasyānutpādo na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1264: rasa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyo rasena yaś ca śūnyo na sa raso notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1265: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo rasasyānutpādo na sa rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1267: yaś ca śūnyo na sa sparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1268: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1269: dharmā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā dharmair ye ca śūnyā na te dharmā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1270: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo dharṃānām anutpādo na te dharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1272: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1273: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaś cakṣurvijñānasyānutpādo na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1275: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tac chrotravijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1276: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śrotravijñānasyānutpādo na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1278: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1279: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo ghrāṇavijñānasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1282: yac ca śūnyaṃ na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1283: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jihvāvijñānasyānutpādo na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1285: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tat kāyavijñānaṃ notpādaḥ anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yat kāyavijñānasyānutpādo na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1287: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan manovijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1288: anena āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo manovijñānasyānutpādo na tan manovijñānam.
S06sspp2_2u:1289: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśena yaś ca śūnyo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1290: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1292: yaś ca śūnyo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1293: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1295: yaś ca śūnyo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1296: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1298: yaś ca śūnyo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1299: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jihvāsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1301: yaś ca śūnyo na sa kāyasaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1302: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1304: yaś ca śūnyo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1305: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo manaḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1307: yā ca śūnyā na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1308: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyaya vedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1310: yā ca śūnyā na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1314: yā ca śūnyā na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1315: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1317: yā ca śūnyā na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1318: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1320: yā ca śūnyā na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1321: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1323: yā ca śūnyā na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1324: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā.
S06sspp2_2u:1326: yaś ca śūnyo na sa pṛthivīdhātur notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1327: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor anutpādo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1329: yaś ca śūnyo na so 'bdhātur notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1330: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'bdhātor anutpādo na so 'bdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1332: yaś ca śūnyo na sa tejodhātur notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1333: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yas tejodhātor anutpādo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1335: yaś ca śūnyo na sa vāyudhātur notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1336: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vāyudhātor anutpādo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1338: yaś ca śūnyo na sa ākāśadhātur notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1339: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya ākāśadhātor anutpādo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1341: yaś ca śūnyo na sa vijñānadhātur notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1342: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vijñānadhātor anutpādo na sa vijñānadhātuḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1345: yā ca śūnyā na sāvidyā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1346: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo avidyāyā anutpādo na sāvidyā,
S06sspp2_2u:1348: ye ca śūnyā na te saṃskārā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1349: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ vijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyaṃ vijñānena,
S06sspp2_2u:1350: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1351: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1353: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāmarūpaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1354: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo nāmarūpasyānutpādo na tan nāmarūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1356: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1357: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ ṣaḍāyatanasyānutpādo na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1359: yaś ca śūnyo na sa sparśo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1360: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1362: yā ca śūnyā na sā vedanā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1363: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vedanāyām anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1365: yā ca śūnyā na sā tṛṣṇā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1366: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yas tṛṣṇāyā anutpādo na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_2u:1368: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tad upādānaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1369: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad upādānasyānutpādo na tad upādānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1371: yaś ca śūnyo na sa bhavo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1372: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo bhavasyānutpādo na sa bhavaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1374: yā ca śūnyā na sā jātir notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1375: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jāter anutpādo na sā jātiḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1377: yac ca śūnyaṃ na taj jarāmaraṇaṃ notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1378: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo jarāmaraṇasyānutpādo na taj jarāmaraṇam.
S06sspp2_2u:1380: yā ca śūnyā na sā dānapāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1381: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1383: yā ca śūnyā na sā śīlapāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1384: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā (ŚsP II-2 35)
S06sspp2_2u:1387: yā ca śūnyā na sā kṣāntipāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1388: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā anutpādo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1390: yā ca śūnyā na sā vīryapāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1391: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vīryapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā vīryapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1393: yā ca śūnyā na sā dhyānapāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1394: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo dhyānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dhyānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1396: yā ca śūnyā na sā prajñāpāramitā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1397: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_2u:1399: yā ca śūnyā na sādhyātmaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1400: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sādhyātmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1402: yā ca śūnyā na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1403: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1405: yā ca śūnyā na sādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1406: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1408: yā ca śūnyā na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1409: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1411: yā ca śūnyā na sā mahāśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1412: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo mahāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā mahāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1414: yā ca śūnyā na sā paramārthaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1415: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1417: yā ca śūnyā na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1418: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1421: yā ca śūnyā na sātyantaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1422: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'tyantaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sātyantaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1424: yā ca śūnyā na sānavarāgraśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1425: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'navarāgraśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānavarāgraśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1427: yā ca śūnyā na sānavakāraśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1428: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'navakāraśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānavakāraśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1430: yā ca śūnyā na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1431: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1433: yā ca śūnyā na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1434: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1436: yā ca śūnyā na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1437: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1439: yā ca śūnyā na sānupalambhaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1440: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'nupalambhaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānupalambhaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1442: yā ca śūnyā na sābhāvaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1443: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'bhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sābhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1445: yā ca śūnyā na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1446: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1448: yā ca śūnyā na sābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1449: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_2u:1450: smṛtyupasthānāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyāni smṛtyupasthānaṃ yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1451: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1453: samyakprahāṇair yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni samyakprahāṇāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1454: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ samyakprahāṇānām anutpādo na tāni samyakprahāṇāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1455: ṛddhipādā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyā ṛddhipādair yā ca śūnyā na te ṛddhipādā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1456: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya ṛddhipādānām anutpādo na te ṛddhipādāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1457: indriyāṇi āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyānīndriyair yāni ca śūnyāni na tānīndriyāṇi notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1458: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya indriyāṇām anutpādo na tānīndriyāṇi,
S06sspp2_2u:1459: balāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyāni balair yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni balāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1460: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo balānām anutpādo na tāni balāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1461: bodhyaṅgāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyāni bodhyaṅgair yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni bodhyaṅgāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1462: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo bodhyaṅgānām anutpādo na tāni bodhyaṅgāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1463: āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnya āryāṣṭāṅgamārgena yaś ca śūnyo na sa mārgo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1464: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasyānutpādo na sa mārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1466: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāny āryasatyāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1467: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya āryasatyānām anutpādo na tāny āryasatyāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1469: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāny dhyānāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1470: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo dhyānānām anutpādo na tāny dhyānāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1472: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāny apramāṇāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1473: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo pramāṇānām anutpādo na tāny apramāṇāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1475: yāś ca śūnyā na tā ārūpyasamāpattayo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1476: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya ārūpyasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1478: ye ca śūnyā na te vimokṣā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1479: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vimokṣāṇām anutpādo na te vimokṣāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1481: yāś ca śūnyā na tā anupūrvavihārasamāpattayo notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1482: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'nupūrvavihārasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1484: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1485: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām anutpādo na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1487: yāś ca śūnyā na tā abhijñā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1488: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo 'bhijñāyā anutpādo na tā abhijñāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1490: ye ca śūnyā na te samādhayo notpādaḥ anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ samādhīnām anutpādo na te samādhayaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1492: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni dhāraṇīmukhāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1493: anena āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo dhāraṇīmukhānām anutpādo na tāni dhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1495: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni tathāgatabalāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1496: anena āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ tathāgatabalānām anutpādo na tāni tathāgatabalāni,
S06sspp2_2u:1498: yāni ca śūnyāni na tāni vaiśāradyāni notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1499: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo vaiśāradyānām anutpādo na tāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvida āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śūnyāḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1500: yāś ca śūnyā na tā pratisaṃvido notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1501: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ pratisaṃvidām anutpādo na tā pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1503: yā ca śūnyā na sā mahāmaitrī notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1504: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo mahāmaitryā anutpādo na sā mahāmaitrī,
S06sspp2_2u:1506: yā ca śūnyā na sā mahākaruṇā notpādaḥ anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo mahākaruṇāyā anutpādo na sā mahākaruṇā,
S06sspp2_2u:1508: ye ca śūnyā na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmā notpādaḥ anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa ya āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām anutpādo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1510: yā ca śūnyā na sā sarvajñatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1511: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ sarvajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvajñatā,
S06sspp2_2u:1513: yā ca śūnyā na sā mārgākārajñatā notpādaḥ anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yo mārgākārajñatāyā anutpādo (ŚsP II-2 39)
S06sspp2_2u:1516: yā ca śūnyā na sā sarvākārajñatā notpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1517: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
S06sspp2_2u:1518: āha: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi?
S06sspp2_2u:1519: yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1520: yo vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1521: yaḥ saṃjñāyā vyayo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_2u:1522: yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1523: yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam.
S06sspp2_2u:1524: yaś cakṣuṣo vyayo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1525: yaḥ śrotrasya vyayo na tac chrotraṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1526: yo ghrāṇasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1527: yo jihvāyā vyayo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_2u:1528: yaḥ kāyasya vyayo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1529: yo manaso vyayo na tan manaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1530: yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1531: yaḥ śabdasya vyayo na sa śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1532: yo gandhasya vyayo na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1533: yo rasasya vyayo na sa rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1534: yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1535: yo dharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te dharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1536: yaś cakṣurvijñānasya vyayo na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1537: yaḥ śrotravijñānasya vyayo na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1538: yo ghrāṇavijñanasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1539: yo jihvāvijñanasya vyayo na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1540: yaḥ kāyavijñanasya vyayo na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1541: yo manovijñānasya vyayo na tan manovijñānam.
S06sspp2_2u:1542: yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1543: yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa chrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1544: yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1545: yo jihvāsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1546: yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1547: yo manaḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1548: yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1549: yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1550: yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1551: yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1552: yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1553: yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā.
S06sspp2_2u:1554: yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor vyayo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1556: yas tejodhātor vyayo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1557: yo vāyudhātor vyayo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1558: ya ākāśadhātor vyayo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1559: yo vijñānadhātor vyayo na sa vijñānadhātuḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1562: yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1563: yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1564: yo nāmarūpasya vyayo na tan nāmarūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1565: yaḥ ṣaḍāyatanasya vyayo na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1566: yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1567: yo vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1568: yas tṛṣṇāyā vyayo na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_2u:1569: ya upādānasya vyayo na tad upādānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1570: yo bhavasya vyayo na sa bhavaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1571: yo jāter vyayo na sā jātiḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1572: yo jarāmaraṇasya vyayo na taj jarāmaraṇam.
S06sspp2_2u:1573: yo dānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1574: yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā vyayo na sā śīlapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1575: yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vyayo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1576: yo vīryapāramitāyā vyayo na sā vīryapāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:1577: yo dhyānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dhyānapāramitā,

S06sspp2_2u:1761: yaḥ śabdasya vyayo na sa śabdaḥ, yo (ŚsP II-2 45)
S06sspp2_2u:1763: yo rasasya vyayo na sa rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1764: yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1765: yo dharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te dharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1766: yaś cakṣurvijñānasya vyayo na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1767: yaḥ śrotravijñānasya vyayo na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1768: yo ghrāṇavijñānasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,

S06sspp2_2u:1770: yaḥ kāyavijñānasya vyayo na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:1771: yo manovijñānasya vyayo na tan manovijñānam.
S06sspp2_2u:1772: yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1773: yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1774: yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,

S06sspp2_2u:1777: yo manaḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:1778: yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1779: yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,

S06sspp2_2u:1782: yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_2u:1783: yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā.
S06sspp2_2u:1784: yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor vyayo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1786: yas tejodhātor vyayo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1787: yo vāyudhātor vyayo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1788: ya ākāśadhātor vyayo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:1789: yo vijñānadhātor vyayo na sa vijñānadhātuḥ.

S06sspp2_2u:1792: yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānaṃ,

S06sspp2_2u:1807: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā vyayo na sā prajñāpāramitā.

S06sspp2_2u:2536: cakṣur anutpādaḥ śrotram anutpādo ghrāṇam anutpādo jihvānutpādaḥ kāyo 'nutpādo mano 'nutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2537: rūpam anutpādaḥ śabdo 'nutpādo gandho 'nutpādo raso 'nutpādaḥ sparśo 'nutpādo dharmā anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2539: śrotravijñānam anutpādo ghrāṇavijñānam anutpādo jihvāvijñānam anutpādaḥ kāyavijñānam anutpādo manovijñānam anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2540: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo jihvāsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo manaḥsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2542: pṛthivīdhātur anutpādo 'bdhātur anutpādaḥ tejodhātur anutpādo vāyudhātur anutpāda ākāśadhātur anutpādo vijñānadhātur anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2543_0: avidyānutpādaḥ saṃskārā anutpādo vijñānam anutpādo nāmarūpam anutpādaḥ ṣaḍāyatanam
S06sspp2_2u:2543_1: anutpādaḥ sparśo 'nutpādo vedanānutpādaḥ tṛṣṇānutpāda upādānam anutpādo bhavo 'nutpādo
S06sspp2_2u:2544: dānapāramitānutpādaḥ śīlapāramitānutpādaḥ kṣāntipāramitānutpādo vīryapāramitānutpādo dhyānapāramitānutpādaḥ prajñāpāramitānutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2547_0: smṛtyupasthānāny anutpādaḥ samyakprahāṇāny anutpāda ṛddhipādā anutpādaḥ indriyāṇy
S06sspp2_2u:2547_1: anutpādo balāny anutpādo bodhyaṅgāny anutpāda āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'nutpāda āryasatyāny
S06sspp2_2u:2547_2: anutpādaś catvāri dhyānāny anutpādaś catvāry apramāṇāny anutpāda catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo
S06sspp2_2u:2549_0: samādhayo 'nutpādo dhāraṇīmukhāny anutpādaḥ daśatathāgatabalāny anutpādaś catvāri
S06sspp2_2u:2549_1: vaiśāradyāny anutpādaś catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'nutpādo mahāmaitry anutpādo mahākaruṇānutpādo
S06sspp2_2u:2567: buddhadharmā apy anutpādaḥ. tat prāptam eva bhavati śrāvakayāṇikaiḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ prāptaiva bhavati,
S06sspp2_2u:2569: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatā pañcānāṃ gatīnāṃ bhede na bhaviṣyati prāptaiva bhavati bodhisattvena mahasattvena pañcavidhā bodhiḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2571: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ srotaāpannena trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo bhāvitaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:2573: anāgāminā pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo bhāvitaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:2574: arhatā pañcānāṃ mūrdhabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya mārgo bhāvitaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:2576: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo duṣkaracaryāñ carati yad duḥkhāni sattvānāṃ kṛtane pratyanubhavati?
S06sspp2_2u:2580: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:2581: nāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpādasya dharmasya prāptim icchāmi na samayaṃ cānutpādasya srotaāpattitvam icchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:2583: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānutpādasyānāgāmitvam icchāmi nānāgāmiphalaṃ nānutpādasyārhattvam icchāmi nārhattvasākṣātkriyāṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:2584_0: nānutpādasya pratyekabuddhatvam icchāmi na pratyekabodhir nāpy aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrecchāmi
S06sspp2_2u:2584_1: yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo duṣkaracaryāṃ caran nāpi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo duṣkarasaṃjñayā
S06sspp2_2u:2585_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ janayitvāśakyam aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:2585_1: sattvānām arthaṃ kartum api tv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra sarvattveyumātṛsaṃjñā janayitvā
S06sspp2_2u:2585_2: pitṛsaṃjñāṃ janayitvā putrasaṃjñā janayitvāsakyam aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānām
S06sspp2_2u:2585_3: arthakartun tac cānupalambhayogena evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittam utpādayitavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:2586: yathātmātmeti cocyate sa ca sarveṇa sarvathā sarvaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_2u:2588: saced evaṃ saṃjñām utpādayitavyeti duṣkarasaṃjñām utpadayiṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:2589_0: tathā hi na sa kaccit tad dharmam utpādayati nopalabhyate nāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpāde
S06sspp2_2u:2589_1: tathāgatam icchāmi nānuttarā saṃyaksaṃbodhir yathā tathāgatena dharmacakraṃ pravartitaṃ
S06sspp2_2u:2589_2: na hy anutpannena dharmeṇa prāptiḥ prāpyate.
S06sspp2_2u:2590: āha: kim punas tvam āyuṣman subhūte utpannena dharmeṇa prāptim icchasi?
S06sspp2_2u:2593: nāham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpānnena dharmeṇa prāptim icchāmi nāpy anutpannena dharmeṇa prāpyamāṇām.
S06sspp2_2u:2594: āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte nāsti prāptir nāsty abhisamayaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2596: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prāptir asty abhisamayo na punaḥ paramārthena dharmeṇa.
S06sspp2_2u:2597_0: api tu khalu punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra lokavyavahāreṇa prāptir abhisamayo vā
S06sspp2_2u:2597_1: prajñāpyate lokavyavahāreṇa srotaāpanno vā sakṛdāgāmī vā nāgāmī vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabuddho
S06sspp2_2u:2597_2: vā bodhisattvo vā prajñayate. na punaḥ paramārthena prāptir vābhisamayo vā srotaāpanno vā (ŚsP II-2 67)
S06sspp2_2u:2598: sakṛdāgāmī vānāgāmī vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā buddho vā prajñapyate.
S06sspp2_2u:2599: āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte yathaiva lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiś cābhisamayaś ca tathaiva pañcānāṃ gatīnāṃ lokavyavahāreṇa bhedo na punaḥ paramārthena?
S06sspp2_2u:2600: āha: evam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yathaiva lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiś cābhisamayaś ca tathaiva pañcānāṃ gatīnāṃ lokavyavahāreṇa bhedo na punaḥ paramārthena. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:2601: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paramārtheṇa karmaṇaḥ karamavipākaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:2602: notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2603: āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte 'nutpanno dharma utpadyate,
S06sspp2_2u:2607: āha: katamasyāyuṣman subhūte anutpannasya dharmasyotpādaṃ necchasi?
S06sspp2_2u:2617: jihvāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:2626: dharmānām aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi.
S06sspp2_2u:2639: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:2640: śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:2641: ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:2642: jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:2643: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi,
S06sspp2_2u:2644: manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannasya svabhāvaśūnyasyotpādaṃ necchāmi.

S06sspp2_2u:2673: aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,

S06sspp2_2u:2685: anupalambhaśūnyatāyā aham āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrānutpannāyāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāyā utpādaṃ necchāmi,

S06sspp2_2u:2836: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte utpāda utpadyate?
S06sspp2_2u:2838: āha: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrotpāda utpadyate,
S06sspp2_2u:2840_0: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yaś cotpādo yaś cānutpāda ubhāv etau dharmau na
S06sspp2_2u:2840_1: saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktāv arūpiṇāv anidarśanāv apratighāv ekalakṣaṇo yad utālakṣaṇaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2840_2: tad anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa notpāda utpadyate,
S06sspp2_2u:2843: anutpanno dharmo 'nutpanno dharma ity āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti te mantrayitum,
S06sspp2_2u:2844: anutpannānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādo hy āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti mantrayitum.
S06sspp2_2u:2846: anutpanno dharmo 'nutpanno dharma ity āyuṣmañ (ŚsP II-2 77)
S06sspp2_2u:2847: chāradvatīputra yac ca pratibhāti te mantrayitum iti,
S06sspp2_2u:2848: anutpanno dharmo 'nutpanno dharma ity āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra na me pratibhāti mantrayitum,
S06sspp2_2u:2849: anutpannānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādo 'pi me āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra na pratibhāti mantrayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:2850_0: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yaś cānutpanno dharmo yaś cānutpādo yac ca pratibhānaṃ
S06sspp2_2u:2850_1: ye ca mantrā yā cānutpattiḥ sarvadharmā ete na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā
S06sspp2_2u:2851: āha: anutpāda ity āyuṣman subhūte mantraḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:2854: te 'pi dharmā anutpādā yāṃs tān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayitum.
S06sspp2_2u:2856: evam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra anutpādo mantro 'nutpādaḥ pratibhāno 'nutpādo dharmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:2857: te 'pi dharmā anutpādā yāṃs tān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:2858: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra rūpam anutpādo vedanānutpādaḥ saṃjñānutpādaḥ saṃskārānutpādo vijñānam anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2859: cakṣur anutpādaḥ śrotram anutpādo ghrāṇam anutpādo jihvānutpādaḥ kāyo 'nutpādo mano 'nutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2860: rūpam anutpādaḥ śabdo 'nutpādo gandho 'nutpādo raso 'nutpādaḥ sparśo 'nutpādo dharmā anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2862: śrotravijñānam anutpādo ghrāṇavijñānam anutpādo jihvāvijñānam anutpādaḥ kāyavijñānam anutpādo manovijñānam anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2863: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo jihvāsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo 'nutpādo manaḥsaṃsparśo 'nutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2865: pṛthivīdhātur anutpādo 'bdhātur anutpādaḥ tejodhātur anutpādo vāyudhātur anutpāda ākāśadhātur anutpādo vijñānadhātur anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2867_0: avidyānutpādaḥ saṃskārā anutpādo vijñānam anutpādo nāmarūpam anutpādaḥ ṣaḍāyatanam
S06sspp2_2u:2867_1: anutpādaḥ sparśo 'nutpādo vedanānutpādaḥ tṛṣṇānutpāda upādānam anutpādo bhavo 'nutpādo
S06sspp2_2u:2868: dānapāramitānutpādaḥ śīlapāramitānutpādaḥ kṣāntipāramitānutpādo vīryapāramitānutpādo dhyānapāramitānutpādaḥ prajñāpāramitānutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2870_0: smṛtyupasthānāny anutpādaḥ samyakprahāṇāny anutpāda ṛddhipādā anutpādaḥ indriyāṇy
S06sspp2_2u:2870_1: anutpādo balāny anutpādo bodhyaṅgāny anutpāda āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'nutpāda āryasatyāny
S06sspp2_2u:2870_2: anutpādo dhyānāny anutpādo 'pramāṇāny anutpāda ārūpyasamāpattayo 'nutpādo vimokṣānutpādo
S06sspp2_2u:2872_0: samādhayo 'nutpādo dhāraṇīmukhāny anutpādaḥ tathāgatabalāny anutpādo vaiśāradyāny
S06sspp2_2u:2872_1: anutpādaḥ pratisaṃvido 'nutpādo mahāmaitry anutpādo mahākaruṇānutpāda āveṇikabuddhadharmā anutpādaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:2873: srotaāpattiphalam anutpādaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anutpādo 'nāgāmiphalam anutpādo 'rhattvam anutpādaḥ pratyekabodhir anutpādaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:2875: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇānutpādo mantro 'nutpādaṃ pratibhānam anutpādo dharmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:2876: te 'pi dharmā anutpādā yāṃs tān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayitum.
S06sspp2_2u:2877: āha: dharmakathikānām agratāyām ayam āyuṣman subhūtiḥ sthāpayitavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:2878: tathā hi subhūtiḥ sthaviro yato yata eva paripṛcchyate tatas tata eva niḥsarati.
S06sspp2_2u:2880: dharmataiṣāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakānām aniśritānāṃ sarvadharmeṣu te yato yata eva paripṛcchyante (ŚsP II-2 79)
S06sspp2_2u:2881: tatas tata eva niḥsaranti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:2885: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:2886: vedanāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:2887: saṃjñāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:2888: saṃskārā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyās te nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antreṇopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:2889: vijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ taṃ nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_2u:2890: cakṣur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tan nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na

S06sspp2_2u:2999: chāradvatīputra prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaniśritā na bahirdhāniśritā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_2u:3000: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā aniśritāḥ prakṛtiśūnyām upādāya.
S06sspp2_2u:3001: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā rūpaṃ pariśodhayitavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:3036: pṛthivīdhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyo 'bdhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyaḥ tejodhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyo vāyudhātuḥ pariśodhayitavya ākāśadhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyo vijñānadhātuḥ pariśodhayitavyaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:3097: athāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra punar āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:3098: katham āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhimārgaṃ pariśodhayati?
S06sspp2_2u:3100: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dānapāramitā laukiky asti (ŚsP II-2 87)
S06sspp2_2u:3107: āha: katamāyuṣman subhūte dānapāramitā laukikī katamā lokottarā?
S06sspp2_2u:3109: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dātā bhavati dānapatiḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakāyācanakebhyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3110_0: annam annārthikebhyaḥ pānaṃ pānārthikebhyo yānaṃ yānārthikebhyo vastraṃ vastrārthikebhyaḥ
S06sspp2_2u:3110_1: puṣpaṃ puṣpārthikebhyo mālyaṃ mālyārthikebhyo gandhaṃ gandhārthikebhyo vilepanaṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3110_2: vilepanārthikebhya upāśrayam upāśrayārthikebhya śayyāsanaṃ śayyāsanārthikebhya upakaraṇam
S06sspp2_2u:3111: yāvad anyatarānyatarā mānuṣyakāpariṣkārān dadāti putrārthikebhyaḥ putraṃ dadāti duhitṛkārthikebhyo duhitṛn dadāti bhāryārthikebhyo bhāryāṃ dadāti rājyārthikebhyo rājyaṃ dadāti,
S06sspp2_2u:3116: tac ca saṃniśritaḥ parityajati tasyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06sspp2_2u:3122_0: tac ca dānaṃ datvopalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3122_1: samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anena me dānaphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharme sukhitā
S06sspp2_2u:3123: sa triṣu saṃyogeṣu saktas tad dānaṃ dadāti,
S06sspp2_2u:3125: yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ dānasaṃjñāyām eṣu triṣu saṃyogeṣu sakto dānaṃ dadāti. iyam ucyate laukikī dānapāramitā. kena kāraṇenocyate laukikī dānapāramiteti?
S06sspp2_2u:3126: tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati,
S06sspp2_2u:3127: na ca saṃkrāmati tenocyate laukikī dānapāramitā.
S06sspp2_2u:3131: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvas tad dānaṃ dadann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate pratigrāhakaṃ nopalabhyate dānaṃ nopalabhyate vipākañ (ŚsP II-2 88)
S06sspp2_2u:3132: ca nābhinandati. iyam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:3133: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dānaṃ dadāti sarvasattvebhyaś ca tad dānaṃ niryātayati tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:3134: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati. iyam ucyate āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra lokottarā dānapāramitā. kena kāraṇenocyate lokottarā dānapāramiteti?
S06sspp2_2u:3135: tathā hi lokottareti lokā carati saṃkrāmati tenocyate lokottarā dānapāramiteti.
S06sspp2_2u:3136: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śīlapāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
S06sspp2_2u:3138_0: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ śīlaṃ rakṣati tac ca saṃniśrito
S06sspp2_2u:3138_1: bhavati tasyaivaṃ bhavaty aham śīlaṃ rakṣāmi sattvānām arthāya. idam śīlam ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3138_2: karomi tac ca śīlaṃ rakṣann upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3138_3: samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anena me śīlaphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmeṣu sukhino
S06sspp2_2u:3138_4: bhavantv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv iti. sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas tac chīlaṃ rakṣati
S06sspp2_2u:3138_5: yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ śīlasaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī śīlapāramiteti.
S06sspp2_2u:3138_6: tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati tad ucyate laukikīti.
S06sspp2_2u:3142_0: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ śīlaṃ rakṣann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate
S06sspp2_2u:3142_1: sattvān nopalabhyate śīlaṃ nopalabhyate vipākaṃ nābhinandati sarvasattvebhyaś ca
S06sspp2_2u:3142_2: tac chīlaṃ niryātayati. tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06sspp2_2u:3142_3: pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittaṃ na samanupaśyatīyam ucyate lokottarā śīlapāramitā tathā
S06sspp2_2u:3142_4: hi lokā carati uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottareti.
S06sspp2_2u:3143: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra kṣāntipāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
S06sspp2_2u:3145: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati,
S06sspp2_2u:3147: tasyaivaṃ bhavatv ahaṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayāmi sarvasattvānām arthāya,
S06sspp2_2u:3148: iyaṃ kṣāntir ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karoti tañ ca kṣāntiṃ bhāvayann upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ (ŚsP II-2 89)
S06sspp2_2u:3150_0: anena me kṣāntiphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmasukhino bhavantv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv
S06sspp2_2u:3150_1: iti. sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas tā kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3150_2: kṣāntisaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī kṣāntipāramiteti. tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati
S06sspp2_2u:3154: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate sattvān nopalabhyate kṣāntiṃ nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:3156: sarvasattvebhyaś ca tāṃ kṣāntiṃ niryātayati tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:3157: 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati. iyam ucyate lokottarā kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_2u:3158: tathā hi lokāc carati uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottareti.
S06sspp2_2u:3159: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vīryapāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
S06sspp2_2u:3161: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo vīryam ārabhate,
S06sspp2_2u:3162: tac ca saṃniśrita ārabhate tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ vīryam ārabhate sarvasattvānām arthāya,
S06sspp2_2u:3163_0: ayaṃ kāya idaṃ cittam idaṃ vīryam ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karomy ahaṃ vīryapāramitāyāñ carāmi
S06sspp2_2u:3163_1: tac ca vīryam upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarayāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati,
S06sspp2_2u:3164: anena me vīryaphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmasukhino bhavatv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv iti. sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas taṃ vīryam ārabhate,
S06sspp2_2u:3165: yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ vīryasaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī vīryapāramiteti. tathā hi kokato na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati tad ucyate laukikīti.
S06sspp2_2u:3169_0: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo vīryam ārabhamāṇa ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate
S06sspp2_2u:3169_1: sattvān nopalabhyate vīryaṃ nopalabhyate vipākaṃ ca nābhinandati sarvasattvebhyaś
S06sspp2_2u:3169_2: ca tad vīryaṃ niryatayati tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhate nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06sspp2_2u:3169_3: pariṇāmayañ cāpi ca nimittam na samanupaśyatīyam ucyate lokottarā vīryapāramitā tathā hi (ŚsP II-2 90)
S06sspp2_2u:3170: lokāc carati uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottareti.
S06sspp2_2u:3171: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dhyānapāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
S06sspp2_2u:3173: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06sspp2_2u:3174: tac ca saṃniśritaḥ samāpadyate tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dhyānāni samāpadyate sarvasattvānām arthāya,
S06sspp2_2u:3176_0: ahaṃ buddhājñāṃ karomi tac ca dhyānaṃ samāpadyamāna upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ
S06sspp2_2u:3176_1: sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anena me dhyānaphalenaite
S06sspp2_2u:3176_2: sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharmasukhino bhavantv anupādāya ca parinirvāntv iti,
S06sspp2_2u:3177: sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas tad dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06sspp2_2u:3178: yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ dhyānasaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī dhyānapāramiteti,
S06sspp2_2u:3179: tathā hi lokato na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati,
S06sspp2_2u:3184: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvo dhyānāni samāpadyamāna ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate sattvān nopalabhyate vipākaṃ ca nābhinandati,
S06sspp2_2u:3187: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittan na samanupaśyatīyam ucyate lokottarā dhyānapāramitā tathā hi lokāc carati uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottareti.
S06sspp2_2u:3188: asty āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā laukiky asti lokottarā.
S06sspp2_2u:3190: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāṃ bhāvayati,
S06sspp2_2u:3191: tāñ ca saṃniśrito bhāvayati sarvapāpaṃ pratideśayati,
S06sspp2_2u:3192_0: ātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ cārthāya sarvapuṇyam anumodyate sarvabuddhān adhyeṣate upalambhayogena
S06sspp2_2u:3192_1: tac ca sarvakuśalamūlam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty anupāyena tasyaivaṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3192_2: bhavaty ahaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayāmi sarvasattvānām arthāya iyaṃ prajñā imāṃ buddhājñāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3192_3: karomi. tāṃ ca prajñāṃ bhāvayann upalambhayogena sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3192_4: kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati anena me prajñāphalenaite sattvā dṛṣṭa
S06sspp2_2u:3192_5: eva dharme sukhino bhavantv anutpādāya ca parinirvāntv iti,
S06sspp2_2u:3193: sa triṣu saṃjñeṣu saktas tāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayanti,
S06sspp2_2u:3194: yad utātmasaṃjñāyāṃ parasaṃjñāyāṃ prajñāsaṃjñāyām iyam ucyate laukikī (ŚsP II-2 91)
S06sspp2_2u:3195: prajñāpāramitā tathā hi lokān na carati noccarati na saṃkrāmati tad ucyate laukikīti.
S06sspp2_2u:3199: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāṃ bhāvayann ātmānaṃ nopalabhyate sattvān nopalabhyate prajñān nopalabhyate vipākaś ca nābhinandati,
S06sspp2_2u:3202_0: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty api ca nimittan na samanupaśyatīyam ucyate
S06sspp2_2u:3202_1: lokottarā prajñāpāramitā tathā hi lokāc caraty uccarati saṃkrāmati tad ucyate lokottarā prajñāpāramiteti.
S06sspp2_2u:3203: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhimārgaṃ pariśodhayati.
S06sspp2_2u:3204: āha: katamāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:3231: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3238: catvāry āryasatyāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3248: daśatathāgatabalāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3253: aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārgaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:3254: āha: sādhu sādhv āyuṣman subhūte katamasyā ayaṃ pāramitāyāḥ puruṣakāraḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:3256: prajñāpāramitāyā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāyaṃ puruṣakāraḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:3257: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā (ŚsP II-2 93)
S06sspp2_2u:3258_0: janayitrī sarvakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śrāvakadharmāṇāṃ pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3258_1: prajñāpāramitāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra parigrāhikā saṃgrāhikā sarvakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3258_2: śrāvakadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_2u:3258_3: caritaiḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3259_0: anāgatā apy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tathāgatārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā atraiva prajñāpāramitāyāñ
S06sspp2_2u:3259_1: caritvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. ye 'pi te āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_2u:3259_2: daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhrīyante yāpayanti,
S06sspp2_2u:3261_0: sacet punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3261_1: bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhanvāyitatvaṃ vā veditavyam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_2u:3261_2: viharaty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena vihāreṇa yad uta sarvasattvānāṃ trāṇāya
S06sspp2_2u:3261_3: sarvasattvānām aparityāgatāyai tac cānupalambhayogena viharaty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06sspp2_2u:3262: āha: viharatum āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'yam anena vihāreṇecchasi,
S06sspp2_2u:3263: avirahitaṃ cānena manasikāreṇa yad uta mahākaruṇā manasikāreṇa,
S06sspp2_2u:3264: evaṃ saty āyuṣman subhūte sarvasattvā bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:3267: sādhu sādhv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra upālapsye upālapsya iti. ata evāyuṣmatā śāradvatīputreṇa bhūtapadābhidhānena parigṛhītaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:3268: sattvāsattayāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra manasikārāsattā veditavyā sattvābhāvatayā manasikārābhāvatā veditavyā sattvāsvabhāvatayā manasikārāsvabhāvatā veditavyā,
S06sspp2_2u:3917: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahita eva tena manasikāreṇa veditavyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3919: atha bhagavān āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāram adāt:
S06sspp2_2u:3921: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitopadeṣṭavyā,
S06sspp2_2u:3922: yathā tvam upadiśasi yathāpi taṃ tathāgatasyānubhāvena evaṃ ca punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:3923: yathā tvam upadiśasi. asmin khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitā parivartā.
S06sspp2_2u:3924: āyuṣmatā subhūtinā bhāṣyamāne ayam trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍ vikāram akaṃpat prākaṃpat saṃprākaṃpat,
S06sspp2_2u:3943: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ prādur akārṣīt.
S06sspp2_2u:3945: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasyāviṣkaraṇe?
S06sspp2_2u:3946: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:3947_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva pūrvasyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3947_1: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
S06sspp2_2u:3948_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva dakṣiṇasyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3948_1: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho imām
S06sspp2_2u:3949_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva paścimāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3949_1: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
S06sspp2_2u:3950_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaivottarāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3950_1: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
S06sspp2_2u:3951_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaivottarapūrvasyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3951_1: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
S06sspp2_2u:3952_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3952_1: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
S06sspp2_2u:3954_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3954_1: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
S06sspp2_2u:3955_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaiva paścimottarasyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:3955_1: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
S06sspp2_2u:3956_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaivādhastād
S06sspp2_2u:3956_1: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
S06sspp2_2u:3957_0: yathaivāhaṃ subhūte iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣe tathaivopariṣṭād
S06sspp2_2u:3957_1: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imām
S06sspp2_2u:3958: yasmin khalu punaḥ subhūte prajñāpāramitānirdeśe bhāṣyamāṇe dvādaśānām ayutānāṃ devamāṇuṣyakānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntir utpannā,
S06sspp2_2u:3959: teṣām api samantād daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇānām asaṃkhyeyānām aprameyānāṃ sattvānām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni.
S06sspp2_2u:3962: atha khalu yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahārājānas te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasāhasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3963: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śakrā devendrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3964: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau suyāmā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3965: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau saṃtuṣitā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3966: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau nirmitā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3967: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau vaśavartinā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3968: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahābrahmāṇas te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3969: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ābhāsvarā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3970: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śubhakṛtsnā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3971: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau bṛhatphalā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3972: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrās te sarve 'nekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06sspp2_2u:3973: yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau yaś ca teṣāṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3974: yaś ca teṣāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3975: yaś ca teṣāṃ yāmānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3976: yaś ca teṣāṃ tuṣitānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3977: yaś ca teṣāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ devānāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3978: yaś ca teṣāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3979: yaś ca teṣāṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ devāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3982: yaś ca teṣām śubhakṛtsnānām devānāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3983: yaś ca teṣāṃ bṛhatphalānāṃ devānāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3984: yaś ca teṣāṃ śuddhāvāsakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:3985: sa tathāgatasya prakṛtyavabhāsasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06sspp2_2u:3989: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśām api na kṣamate,
S06sspp2_2u:3990: tathāgatasya prakṛtyā ābhāyāḥ purataḥ sarvās tā devānāṃ karmavipākajā ābhā na bhāsante na tapanti na virocante,
S06sspp2_2u:3991: tathāgatasyaiṣābhā sāgrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate viśiṣṭākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāte praṇītākhyāyate anuttarākhyāyate niruttarākhyāyate.
S06sspp2_2u:3992: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:3993_0: ete bhadanta subhūte yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā
S06sspp2_2u:3993_1: devāḥ trayastriṃśā devā yāmā devā tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino
S06sspp2_2u:3993_2: devā brahmakāyikā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhatphalā devāḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikā
S06sspp2_2u:3993_3: devās te sarve saṃnipatitā bhadanta subhūte dharmaśravaṇāya prajñāpāramitopadeśaṃ śrotukāmāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:3994: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam?
S06sspp2_2u:3996: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāraitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam?
S06sspp2_2u:3997: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakram devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:3998_0: tena hi kauśika śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikurūpadeśyāmi buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena
S06sspp2_2u:3998_1: ca bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06sspp2_2u:3998_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ yathā ca śikṣitavyam. yaiś ca devaputrair anuttarāyai
S06sspp2_2u:3999: tair apy anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittam utpādayitavyam. ye punar avakrāntasamyaktvanyāmāt,
S06sspp2_2u:4000: te pratibalā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittam utpādayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:4003: api tu khalu punas teṣām apy anumode saced anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhyaye cittam utpādayati,
S06sspp2_2u:4004: nāhaṃ teṣāṃ kuśalapakṣasyāntarāyaṃ karomi viśiṣṭebhyo hi dharmebhyo viśiṣṭatamā dharmā adhyālambitavyaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:4005: tatra katamā kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā?
S06sspp2_2u:4006: iha kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittotpādena,
S06sspp2_2u:5183: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair dānapāramitāyāṃ caraty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5189: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5190: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāri samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5191: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāra ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5193: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiḥ pañca balāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5194: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiḥ sapta bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5196: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāry āryasatyāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5197: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāri dhyānāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5198: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāry apramāṇāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5201: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair aṣṭau vimokṣāṃ bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5208: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catvāri vaiśāradyāni bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5209: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiś catasraḥ pratisaṃvido bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:5212: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādair aṣṭā daśāveṇikabuddhadharmān bhāvayaty anupalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:5213_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate
S06sspp2_2u:5213_1: dharmā evaite dharmān abhiṣyandayanti pariṣyandayanti paripūrayanti parispharayanti parimīmāṃsyante,
S06sspp2_2u:5214: nāsty atrātmā vā ātmīyaṃ va. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:5215: tathā hi yad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāmanācittaṃ tad bodhicitte na samavahitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:5216: yad bodhicittaṃ tat pariṇāmanācitte na samavahitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:5217: yat kauśika pariṇāmanācittaṃ tad bodhicitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_2u:5218_0: yad bodhicittaṃ tat pariṇāmanācitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate. iyaṃ kausika bodhisattvasya
S06sspp2_2u:5218_1: mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā yad evaṃ sarvadharmāś ca pratyavekṣate na kvacid dharmeṣu paricarati.
S06sspp2_2u:5219: evam ukte śakro devānām indraḥ subhūtisthaviram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:5220: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūtte pariṇāmanācittaṃ bodhicitte na samavahitam?
S06sspp2_2u:5222: kathaṃ pariṇāmanācittaṃ bodhicitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate?
S06sspp2_2u:5224: kathaṃ bodhicittaṃ pariṇāmanācitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate?
S06sspp2_2u:5228: iti hi yad acittaṃ tad acintyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:5229: yad acintyaṃ tad acittaṃ na hy acittatā acittatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati,
S06sspp2_2u:5231: iti hi yā acittatā sā acintyatā yā acintyatā sā acittatā,
S06sspp2_2u:5233: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayate sma:
S06sspp2_2u:5234: sādhu sādhu subhūte sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitām upadiśasy utsāhaṃ dadāsi.
S06sspp2_2u:5237_0: tathā hi paurvakānāṃ tathāgatānām arham arhantāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antike taiḥ śrāvakais
S06sspp2_2u:5237_1: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu codito
S06sspp2_2u:5237_2: 'nuśiṣṭāḥ saṃdarśitaḥ samādāyitaḥ samuttejitaḥ saṃpraharṣitaḥ niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ
S06sspp2_2u:5237_3: yato bhagavaṃ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitaḥ. anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06sspp2_2u:5237_4: abhisaṃbuddhaḥ evam eva bhagavann asmābhir bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsv
S06sspp2_2u:5242_0: asmābhir api bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsv avavaditā anuśiṣṭāḥ saṃharṣitāḥ
S06sspp2_2u:5242_1: samādāpitaḥ samuttejitāḥ saṃpraharṣitaḥ niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06sspp2_2u:5243: athāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakram devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:5244: tena hi kauśika śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:5245: yathā ca na sthātavyaṃ rūpaṃ kauśika rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:5251_0: iti hi kauśika rūpaśūnyatā ca vedanāśūnyatā ca saṃjñāśūnyatā ca saṃskāraśūnyatā ca
S06sspp2_2u:5251_1: vijñānaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ khalu kauśika
S06sspp2_2u:5252: punar aparaṃ kauśika cakṣuś cakṣuṣā śūnyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:5259_0: iti hi kauśika cakṣuḥśūnyatā ca śrotraśūnyatā ca ghrāṇaśūnyatā ca jihvāśūnyatā ca
S06sspp2_2u:5259_1: kāyaśūnyatā ca manaḥśūnyatā ca bodisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ
S06sspp2_2u:5259_2: khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06sspp2_2u:5260: punar aparaṃ kauśika rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:5267_0: iti hi kauśika rūpaśūnyatā ca śabdaśūnyatā ca gandhaśūnyatā ca rasaśūnyatā ca sparśaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_2u:5267_1: ca dharmaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ khalu kauśika
S06sspp2_2u:5268: punar aparaṃ kauśika cakṣurvijnānaṃ cakṣurvijñānena śūnyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:5275_0: iti hi kauśika cakṣurvijñānaśūnyatā ca śrotravijñānaśūnyatā ca ghrāṇavijñānaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_2u:5275_1: ca jihvāvijñānaśūnyatā ca kāyavijñānaśūnyatā ca manovijnānaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_2u:5275_2: cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06sspp2_2u:5276: punar aparaṃ kauśika cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:5283_0: iti hi kauśika cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatā ca śrotrasaṃsparśaśūnyatā ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_2u:5283_1: ca jihvāsaṃsparśaśūnyatā ca kāyasaṃsparśaśūnyatā ca manaḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_2u:5283_2: cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06sspp2_2u:5284: punar aparaṃ kauśika cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāvedanā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāvedanayā śūnyā,
S06sspp2_2u:5292_0: iti hi kauśika cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāvedanāśūnyatā ca śrotrasaṃsparśajāvedanāśūnyatā ca
S06sspp2_2u:5292_2: ca manaḥsaṃsparśajāvedanāśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_2u:5292_3: evaṃ klialu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.

S06sspp2_2u:5314_1: ca ṣaḍāyatanaśūnyatā ca sparśaśūnyatā ca vedanāśūnyatā ca tṛṣṇāśūnyatā copādānaśūnyatā

S06sspp2_2u:5322_1: ca vīryapāramitāśūnyatā ca dhyānapāramitāśūnyatā ca prajñāpāramitāśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā

S06sspp2_2u:5343_0: iti hi kauśikādhyātmaśūnyatā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā ca śūnyatāśūnyatā

S06sspp2_2u:5343_2: cānavarāgraśūnyatā cānavakāraśūnyatā ca prakṛtiśūnyatā ca sarvadharmaśūnyatā ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā

S06sspp2_2u:5344: punar aparaṃ kauśika smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānaiḥ śūnyāni,

S06sspp2_2u:5352_1: cendriyaśūnyatā ca balaśūnyatā ca bodhyaṅgaśūnyatā ca mārgaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā

S06sspp2_2u:5375_1: cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
