S06sspp2_2u:6607: sarvākārajñatā praṇihitety apraṇihiteti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6608: punar aparaṃ kauśika srotaāpattiphalam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6609: sakṛdāgāmiphalam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6610: anāgāmiphalam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6611: arhattvam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6612: pratyekabodhir asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6615: srotaāpannā dakṣiṇīyam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6616: sakṛdāgāmī dakṣiṇīyam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6617: anāgāmī dakṣiṇīyam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6618: arhan dakṣiṇīyam asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6619: pratyekabuddho dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6620: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6621: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamāyāṃ bhūmau na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6631: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpāde sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6645: bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya buddhabhūmau sthāsyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6648_0: pañcasu bodhisattvābhijñāsu sthitvā aprameyāny asaṃkhyeyāni buddhakṣetrāṇy upasaṃkramiṣyāmi
S06sspp2_2u:6648_1: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya śrutvā ca
S06sspp2_2u:6648_2: tathatvāya parebhyo deśayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6649: yādṛśāni ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāni tadṛśāni eva pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6650: sattvān bodhau paripācayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6651: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃś ca lokadhātuṃ gatvā tān tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkariṣyāmīti gurukariṣyāmīti mānayiṣyāmīti pūjayiṣyāmīti,
S06sspp2_2u:6652: puṣpamālyagandhavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ koṭīniyutaśatasahasraiś ca tāṃs tathāgatāṃ pūjayiṣyāmīty evam api na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6653: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6654: pañcacakṣuṣy utpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. katamāni pañca?
S06sspp2_2u:6655: māṃsacakṣur divyacakṣuḥ prajñācakṣur dharmacakṣur buddhacakṣur utpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6657: yena yena punaḥ samādhīn ākāṅkṣayiṣyāmi vikrīḍituṃ tena tena samādhinā vikrīḍiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogema,
S06sspp2_2u:6660: catvāri vaiśāradyāni pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6661: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6664: aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti evam api bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6665: dvātriṃśatāni mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni kāye pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam (ŚsP II-2 180)
S06sspp2_2u:6667: aśīty anuvyañjanāni kāye pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6673: kulaṃkula ity ekavīcika iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6675: āyuḥkṣaye kleśakṣaye ceti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6677: sakṛdāgāmi sakṛd imaṃ lokam āgamya duḥkhasyāṃ taṃ kariṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6678: anāgagāmiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratikannaka iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6679: anāgāmi tatraiva nirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6680: arhatphalasākṣātkriyāyaiḥ pratipannaka iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6681: arhann ihaivānupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayiṣyatīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6683: atikramya śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ ca bodhisattvabhūmau sthāsyāmīti iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6684: mārgākārajñatājñāne sarvākārajñatāyāṃ ca na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6685: sarvākāraiḥ sarvadharmān abhisaṃbuddhā sarvāvāsanā na saṃvikte śakṣayāyāṃ na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6686: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakrapravartayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6687: buddhakārye kṛtvā aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān lokadhātūn parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti,
S06sspp2_2u:6689: caturṣu ṛddhipādeṣu sthitvā tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpatsye yathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān tiṣṭheyam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6690: aparimitaś ca me āyur bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6691: dvātriṃśatāṃ me mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānām ekaikalakṣaṇaṃ śatapuṇyapariniṣpannaṃ bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6701: tāvanta ekaṃ me buddhakṣetraṃ bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6702: vajropamo me trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6703: bodhivṛkṣāś ca me tādṛśo gandho niścaret,
S06sspp2_2u:6704: ye sattvās taṃ gandham ājighreyus teṣām na rāgadveṣamohāś ca vyābādheyur iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6705: na śrāvakacittaṃ na pratyekabuddhacittam utpadyeyur iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6706: sarve ca te niyatā bhaveyur anuttarāyā samyaksaṃbuddhāv iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6707: ye ca sattvās taṃ bodhivṛkṣagandham ājighreyus teṣāṃ na kaścid vyādhir bhaved kāye vā citte veti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6708: tatra ca me buddhakṣetre na rūpaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6709: na vedanāśabdo bhaven na saṃjñāśabdo bhaven na saṃskāraśabdo bhaven na vijñānaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6710: na dhātuśabdo nāyatanaśabdo na pratītyasamutpādaśabdo bhaved iti sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6711_0: na dānapāramitāśabdo bhaven na śīlapāramitāśabdo bhaven na kṣāntipāramitāśabdo bhaven
S06sspp2_2u:6711_1: na vīryapāramitāśabdo bhaven na dhyānapāramitāśabdo bhaven na prajñāpāramitāśabdo
S06sspp2_2u:6712: nādhyātmaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na bahirdhāśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6713_0: na śūnyatāśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na mahāśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na paramārthaśūnyatāśabdo
S06sspp2_2u:6713_1: bhaven na saṃsrtaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6714: nātyantaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nānavarāgraśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nānavakāraśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na prakṛtiśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6715: na sarvadharmaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nānupalambhaśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6716: nābhāvaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na svabhāvaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena, (ŚsP II-2 182)
S06sspp2_2u:6717: na smṛtyupasthānaśabdo bhaven na samyakprahāṇaśabdo bhaven na ṛddhipādaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6718: nendriyaśabdo bhaven na balaśabdo bhaven na bodhyaṅgaśabdo bhaven nāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaśabdo bhaven nāryasatyaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavaym upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6719: na dhyānaśabdo bhaven nāpramāṇaśabdo bhaven nārūpyasamāpattiśabdo bhaven na vimokṣaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6720_1: bhaven nābhijñāśabdo bhaven na samādhiśabdo bhaven na dhāraṇīmukhaśabdo bhaved iti
S06sspp2_2u:6721: na tathāgatabalaśabdo bhaven na vaiśāradyaśabdo bhaven na pratisaṃvidśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6722: na mahāmaitrīśabdo bhaven na mahākaruṇāśabdo bhaven nāveṇikabuddhadharmaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6723: na srotaāpattiśabdo bhaven na sakṛdāgāmiśabdo bhaven nānāgāmiśabdo bhaven nārhattvaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_2u:6724: na pratyekabuddhaśabdo bhaven na buddhaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6725: tathā hi tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sarvadharmā nopalabdhāḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6726: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6728: kathaṃ punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam?
S06sspp2_2u:6729: athāyuṣmataḥ subhūtir āyuṣmataḥ śāradvatīputrasya cetasyaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmataṃ śāradvatīputram āmantrayati sma. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_2u:6730: āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra kva tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6731_0: āha: na kvacid āyuṣman subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthita iti apratisthitamānasaḥ
S06sspp2_2u:6731_1: khalu punar āyuṣman subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sa rūpe na sthito vedanāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6731_2: na sthitaḥ saṃjñāyāṃ na sthitaḥ saṃskāreṣu na sthito vijñāne na sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6732: na cakṣuṣi sthito na śrotre sthito na ghrāṇe sthito na jihvāyāṃ sthito na kāye sthito na manasi sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6734: na rūpe sthito na śabde sthito na gandhe sthito na rase sthito na sparśe sthito na dharmeṣu sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6735: na cakṣurvijñāne sthito na śrotravijñāne sthito na ghrāṇavijñāne sthito na jihvāvijñāne sthito na kāyavijñāne sthito na manovijñāne sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6736: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe sthito na śrotrasaṃsparśe sthito na ghrāṇasaṃsparśe sthito na jihvāsaṃsparśe sthito na kāyasaṃsparśe sthito na manaḥsaṃsparśe sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6737_0: na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito
S06sspp2_2u:6737_1: na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito
S06sspp2_2u:6737_2: na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthito na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6738: na pṛthivīdhātau sthito nābdhātau sthito na tejodhātau sthito na vāyudhātau sthito nākāśadhātau sthito na vijñānadhātau sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6739_0: nāvidyāyāṃ sthito na saṃskāreṣu sthito na vijñāne sthito na nāmarūpe sthito na ṣaḍāyatane
S06sspp2_2u:6739_1: sthito na sparśe sthito na vedanāyāṃ sthito na tṛṣṇāyāṃ sthito nopādāne sthito na
S06sspp2_2u:6739_2: bhave sthito na jātau sthito na jarāmaraṇe sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6740: na dānapāramitāyāṃ sthito na śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthito na vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthito na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6741_0: nādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6741_1: sthito na śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na mahāśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6741_2: sthito na saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nātyantaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6741_3: sthito nānavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nānavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6741_4: sthito na sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nānupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6741_5: sthito nābhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6742_0: na smṛtyupasthāneṣu sthito na samyakprahāṇeṣu sthito na ṛddhipādeṣu sthito nendriyeṣu
S06sspp2_2u:6742_1: sthito na baleṣu sthito na bodhyaṅgeṣu sthito nāryāṣṭāṅge marge sthito nāryasatyeṣu
S06sspp2_2u:6742_2: sthito na dhyāneṣu sthito nāpramāṇeṣu sthito nārūpyasamāpattiṣu sthito na vimokṣeṣu
S06sspp2_2u:6742_4: sthito nābhijñāsu sthito na samādhiṣu sthito na dhāraṇīmukheṣu (ŚsP II-2 184)
S06sspp2_2u:6743_0: sthito na tathāgatabaleṣu sthito na vaiśāradyeṣu sthito na pratisaṃvitsu sthito na
S06sspp2_2u:6743_1: mahāmaitryā sthito na mahākaruṇāyāṃ sthito nāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu sthito na sarvajñatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6743_2: sthito na mārgākārajñatāyāṃ sthito na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6745: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:6746_0: yathā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rūpe naiva sthito nāsthito vedanāyāṃ naiva
S06sspp2_2u:6746_1: sthito nāsthitaḥ samjñāyām naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ saṃskāreṣu naiva sthito nāsthito
S06sspp2_2u:6747: cakṣuṣi naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śrotre naiva sthito nāsthito ghrāṇe naiva sthito nāsthito jihvāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kāye naiva sthito nāsthito manasi naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6748: rūpe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śabde naiva sthito nāsthito gandhe naiva sthito nāsthito rase naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ sparśe naiva sthito nāsthito dharmeṣu naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6749_0: cakṣurvijñāne naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śrotravijñāne naiva sthito nāsthito ghrāṇavijñāne
S06sspp2_2u:6749_1: naiva sthito nāsthito jihvāvijñāne naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kāyavijñāne naiva sthito
S06sspp2_2u:6750_0: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśe naiva sthito nāsthito ghrāṇasaṃsparśe
S06sspp2_2u:6750_1: naiva sthito nāsthito jihvāsaṃsparśe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kāyasaṃsparśe naiva sthito
S06sspp2_2u:6751_1: naiva sthito nāsthito ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6751_2: naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6752_0: pṛthivīdhātau naiva sthito nāsthito 'bdhātau naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ tejodhātau naiva
S06sspp2_2u:6752_1: sthito nāsthito vāyudhātau naiva sthito nāsthita ākāśadhātau naiva sthito nāsthito
S06sspp2_2u:6753_0: avidyāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ saṃskāreṣu naiva sthito nāsthito vijñāne naiva sthito
S06sspp2_2u:6753_1: nāsthito nāmarūpe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ ṣaḍāyatane naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ sparśe
S06sspp2_2u:6753_2: naiva sthito nāsthito vedanāyāṃ naiva sthito (ŚsP II-2 185)
S06sspp2_2u:6754: nāsthitaḥ tṛṣṇāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthita upādāne naiva sthito nāsthito bhave naiva sthito nāsthito jātau naiva sthito nāsthito jarāmaraṇe naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6755_0: dānapāramitāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6755_1: naiva sthito nāsthito vīryapāramitāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito dhyānapāramitāyāṃ naiva
S06sspp2_2u:6755_2: sthito nāsthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.
S06sspp2_2u:6756_0: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito
S06sspp2_2u:6756_1: 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito
S06sspp2_2u:6756_2: nāsthito mahāśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito
S06sspp2_2u:6756_3: nāsthitaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito
S06sspp2_2u:6756_4: nāsthito 'tyantaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito navarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito
S06sspp2_2u:6756_5: nāsthito 'navakāraśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito
S06sspp2_2u:6756_6: nāsthitaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva
S06sspp2_2u:6756_7: sthito nāsthito 'nupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito 'bhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva
S06sspp2_2u:6756_8: sthito nāsthitaḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthito 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_2u:6783: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ sthātavyam ity asthānayogena.
S06sspp2_2u:6785: atha khalu tatra parṣadi keṣāñcid devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
S06sspp2_2u:6786: yāni tāni yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣapadāni yakṣamantritāni yakṣarutāni yakṣapravyāhṛtāni vijñāyante,
S06sspp2_2u:6788: idaṃ punar api na vijñāyate yad āryasubhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate pravyāharati deśayati vibhajaty uttānīkaroti upadiśati.
S06sspp2_2u:6789: athāyuṣmān subhūtis teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya tān devaputrān āmantrayate sma,
S06sspp2_2u:6794: tathā hi devaputrā ekākṣaram api na pravyāhrite tan na śruyate yan na śruyate tan na vijñāyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6795: na hy akṣarāṇi prajñāpāramitā na cātra kaścid deśayitā na śrotā na vijñātā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6796_0: anakṣarā hi devaputrās tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhiḥ tad yathāpi
S06sspp2_2u:6796_1: nāma devaputrās tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho buddhanirmitaṃ nirmimīte. sa ca punar
S06sspp2_2u:6797: atha sa nirmitaḥ tābhyo nirmitābhyaś catasṛbhyaḥ parṣadbhyo dharmaṃ deśayet. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
S06sspp2_2u:6798: devaputrāḥ. api tu tatra parṣadi kenacid deśitaṃ bhavet?
S06sspp2_2u:6802: evam eva devaputrāḥ sarvadharmā nirmitopamās tatra kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacic chrutaṃ na kenacid ājñātaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:6803: tad yathāpi nāma devaputrāḥ svapnāntaragataḥ puruṣas tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhadharmaṃ deśayantaṃ paśyet. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
S06sspp2_2u:6804: devaputrāḥ. api nu tatra deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā ājñātaṃ vā bhavet.
S06sspp2_2u:6807_0: evam eva devaputrāḥ svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmās tatra na kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacid
S06sspp2_2u:6807_1: śrutaṃ na kenacid ājñātaṃ tad yathāpi nāma devaputrāḥ dvau puruṣau parvatakandare
S06sspp2_2u:6807_2: sthitvā buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ dharmasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ saṃghasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:6808: tatra ubhayataḥ pratiśrutkāt svaro niścatet. tat kiṃ manyadhve? (ŚsP II-2 187)
S06sspp2_2u:6809: devaputrāḥ. api nu tenaikena pratiśrutkāśabdena dvitīyapratiśrutkāśabdo vijñāpito bhavet.
S06sspp2_2u:6813: tatra na kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacic chrutaṃ na kenacid ājñātaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:6814_0: tad yathāpi nāma devaputrā dakṣo māyākāro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe tathāgatam
S06sspp2_2u:6814_1: arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham abhinirmimīte. catasraś ca parṣado 'binirmimīto bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāśikāḥ
S06sspp2_2u:6814_2: sa ca nirmitas tābhyo nirmitābhyaḥ parṣadbhyo dharmaṃ deśayet. tat kiṃ manyadhve?
S06sspp2_2u:6816: api nu tatra kenacid deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā ājñātaṃ vā bhavet.
S06sspp2_2u:6819: evam eva devaputrā māyopamāḥ sarvadharmās tatra na kenacic chrutaṃ na kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacid ājñātam.
S06sspp2_2u:6821: uttarīkariṣyati batāyam āryasthaviraḥ subhūtir uttānīkariṣyati batāyam āryasthaviraḥ subhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitām iti,
S06sspp2_2u:6822: atha ca punar gambhīrād gambhīrataraṃ deśayati,
S06sspp2_2u:6824: athāyuṣmān subhūtis teṣām devaputrāṇām cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya tān devaputrān etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:6825: na khalu devaputrā rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ na śūkṣmaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:6829: na vijñānaṃ gambhīraṃ na śūkṣmam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6840: na mano gambhīraṃ na śūkṣmam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6853: na dharmā gambhīrā na śūkṣmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6865: na manovijñānaṃ gambhīraṃ na śūkṣmam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6877: na manaḥsaṃsparśo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6889: na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā gambhīrā na śūkṣmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6902: na vijñānadhātur gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6920: na jarāmaraṇaṃ gambhīraṃ na śūkṣmam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6938: na prajñāpāramitā gambhīrā na śūkṣmā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6963: nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā gambhīrā na śūkṣmā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:6973: nānavarāgraśūnyatāsvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ nānavakāraśūnyatāsvabhāvo gambhīro na śūkṣmaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:7000: śūkṣmāṇi, na pratisaṃvido gambhīrā na śūkṣmāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:7003: nāveṇikabuddhadharmā gambhīrā na śūkṣmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:7029: na sarvākārajñatā gambhīrā na śūkṣmā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_2u:7034: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ rūpaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:7039: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ cakṣuḥ prajñapitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:7045: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ rūpaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:7051: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:7058: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ prajñapitaḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:7112: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ smṛtyupasthānāni prajñapitāni,
S06sspp2_2u:7135: na khalu punar iha dharmadeśanāyāṃ srotaāpannaḥ prajñapito na srotaāpattiphalaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:7136: na sakṛdāgāmī prajñapito na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prajñapitaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:7139: na pratyekabuddhaḥ prajñapito na pratyekabodhiḥ prajñapitā,
S06sspp2_2u:7140: na bodhisattvaḥ prajñapito na bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ prajñapitāḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:7141: na buddhaḥ prajñapito na bodhiḥ prajñapitā,
S06sspp2_2u:7143: athāyuṣmān subhūtis tān devaputrān etad avocat:
S06sspp2_2u:7144: evam etad devaputrā evam etad iti tad anabhilāpyā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddānāṃ bodhiḥ,
S06sspp2_2u:7145: apravyāhārā sā na kenacid chrutā na vijñātā.
S06sspp2_2u:7146: tena hi devaputrā ye srotaāpattiphale sthātukāmāḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
S06sspp2_2u:7147: ye sakṛdāgāmiphale sthātukāmāḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
S06sspp2_2u:7148: ye 'nāgāmīphale sthātukāmā anāgāmiphalaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
S06sspp2_2u:7149: ye 'rhattve sthātukāmā arhattvaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
S06sspp2_2u:7150: ye pratyekabodhau sthātukāmāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ sākṣātkartukamā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
S06sspp2_2u:7151: ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sthātukāmā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya.
S06sspp2_2u:7152: evaṃ khalu devaputrā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_2u:7154: śatasāhasryāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvitīyakhaṇḍe caturdaśamaḥ parivartaḥ samāptaḥ.
